bibl.title: Jewish property confiscated in the Hermopolite nome
bibl.note: Hermopolite nome, ca. 150-225 CE. Fragment of a tax register with reference to property confiscated from the Jews as a result of the uprising in Egypt betwen 115 and 117.
bibl.seg: W. Graham Claytor, Jewish Property Confiscated in the Hermopolite Nome.
Hermopolite nome, ca. 150-225 CE. Fragment of a tax register with reference to property confiscated from the Jews as a result of the uprising in Egypt betwen 115 and 117.
